ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: 'Seize him and drag him bodily into the middle of the Blazing Fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Seize him and drag him into the depths of Hell," (it will be said),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: “Seize him and drag him to the middle of the Blazing Fire,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: (It will be said of such sinners), "Seize them and drag them into the middle of hell.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “Seize him, and forcibly drag him right to the blazing fire.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: (It will be said:) "Seize him and drag him into the midst of blazing Fire,"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Seize him, then drag him down into the middle of the hell;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Take him, and thrust him into the midst of Hell,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: (And it will be said): Take him and drag him to the midst of hell,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: [A voice will cry], "Seize him and drag him into the midst of Hell.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Lay hold of him, and drag him Unto the midst of the Flaming Fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: [The keepers of hell will be told,] ‘Seize him and drag him to the middle of hell,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: (A voice will cry: "Seize ye him and drag him into the midst of the Blazing Fire!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: (It will be said) "Seize him and drag him into the midst of blazing Fire,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Seize him and drag him into the center of Hell.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Seize him and drag him into the midst of Hell!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [It will be commanded], "Seize him and drag him into the midst of the Hellfire,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [44:47] ‘Seize him, it will be said to the Zabāniya [the Guards of Hell], ‘seize the sinner’, and drag him (read fa‘tilūhu or fa‘tulūhu), haul him away violently and brutally, to the midst of Hell-fire, [al-jahīm means] the centre of the Fire.
